attributes.action: BAN BARAK OBAMA FROM INTERFERING IN THE UK'S EU REFERENDUM
attributes.background: Barak Obama is planning to come to the UK in April to support David Cameron in his bid to make us stay in the EU. We do not welcome his interference. This issue is far too important for the UK and we must decide without any outside interference or bullying

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to stop President Obama speaking on the subject of the EU referendum.
